meanings.definition: A competition or event involving multiple schools.
meanings.sent1: The interschools track meet brought together students from different schools.
meanings.sent2: The interschools soccer tournament will take place next weekend.
meanings.sent3: The interschools spelling bee was a buzz of excitement.
meanings.sent4: Participating in the interschools debate was like entering a battlefield of words.
meanings.sent5: The interschools science fair showcased the talents of students across various schools.

meanings.definition: The organization or administration of competitions between schools.
meanings.sent1: The interschools committee worked hard to plan the upcoming chess championship.
meanings.sent2: She was in charge of coordinating the interschools quiz competition.
meanings.sent3: The interschools council met to discuss the logistics of the upcoming basketball tournament.
meanings.sent4: Being part of the interschools board felt like being at the center of a whirlwind of activities.
meanings.sent5: The interschools association aimed to promote friendly competition among schools in the region.
